name: Locateit
body:
### What's Locate it?. Locateit is web application where users all around the world can upload media(video, text, picture) and geotag it! But why people will do that? The answer is simple for social purpose and achievement! Because other users can rate your media and so only the best will appear first . They can of course see all the media put by the other and they can follow a location to receive update when something is post there! *** ## DEVELOPMENT DIARY ### 09/11/2013 Getting started All project need a beginning and so today we set up the repository, the blog and the server.
The server will be running on amazon EC2. ### Authors and Contributors Vincent L'honor√© (vinlho-3@student.ltu.se)
Mathieu Berland (amieba-3@student.ltu.se)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
